arts.ttl: A 230-minute goal drought: All the key stats ahead of Juventus vs. Milan
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Juventus and AC Milan will add another instalment of their historic rivalry on Sunday night when they face off in Turin. This fixture has been played 289 times and Juventus hold an advantage, with 89 wins against Milan’s 66. arts.ttl: GdS: ‘Different giants’ – the ownership models of Juventus and Milan compared
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Juventus and AC Milan remain elite forces in Italian football, but their ownerships come from very different worlds. La Gazzetta dello Sport write that for decades, Juventus-Milan embodied Italy’s industrial spirit, with the recognisable and media-driven faces of Gianni Agnelli and Silvio Berlusconi.
